description: A heavily modified handheld nuclear device on a rocket.  Intended to be fired from a specialized launcher, it has been rigged to explode on impact instead of on a timer.  It can fly further than the explosion will reach, probably.
Pebble - Mark II, takes time and special equipment to create but totally worth it if you want to step up your armor-piercing game with pneumatics

Pebble - Mark III, you've already seen Skeletal Juggernauts, right?Well this is basically miniature version of it - bone coating infused with blob, for some reason this strange infusion works quite well when you coat the normal pebbles with it

Pebble - Mark IV, much deadlier but harder to craft version of 'Pebble - Mark ii', synthesis of rigid alloy and living blob truly makes this ammo spectacular, peculiar even, who would have thought that blob can be turned into living ammo?
